map_phot.wfc3_wideverywide: HST/WFC3 all W+LP+X filters (UVIS1+IR, final throughputs)
map_phot.wfc3_verywide: HST/WFC3 long-pass and extremely wide filters (UVIS1, final throughputs)
map_phot.lsst: LSST ugrizY, March 2012 total filter throughputs (all ABmags)
map_phot.TESS_2mass_kepler: TESS + 2MASS (Vegamags) + Kepler + SDSS griz + DDO51 (in ABmags)

parsec12s_r14: PARSEC version 1.2S Bressan et al. (2012), Tang et al. (2014),  Chen et al. (2014) with COLIBRI TP-AGB Marigo et al. (2013), Rosenfield et al. (2014, 2016)
parsec12s: PARSEC version 1.2S,  Bressan et al. (2012), Tang et al. (2014),  Chen et al. (2014)
parsec11: PARSEC version 1.1, With revised diffusion+overshooting in low-mass stars, and improvements in interpolation scheme.
2010: Marigo et al. (2008) with the Girardi et al. (2010) Case A correction for low-mass, low-metallicity AGB tracks
2010b: Marigo et al. (2008) with the Girardi et al. (2010) Case B correction for low-mass, low-metallicity AGB tracks
2008: Marigo et al. (2008): Girardi et al. (2000) up to early-AGB + detailed TP-AGB from Marigo & Girardi (2007) (for M <= 7 Msun) + Bertelli et al. (1994) (for M > 7 Msun) + additional Z=0.0001 and Z=0.001 tracks.
2002: Basic set of Girardi et al. (2002) : Girardi et al. (2000) + simplified TP-AGB (for M <= 7 Msun) + Bertelli et al. (1994) (for M > 7 Msun) + additional Z=0.0001 and Z=0.001 tracks.

loidl: Loidl et al. (2001) (as in Marigo et al. (2008) and Girardi et al. (2008))
aringer: Aringer et al. (2009) (Note: The interpolation scheme has been slightly improved w.r.t. to the paper's Fig. 19.

sil: Silicates as in Bressan et al. (1998)
Rouleau13_jan17: M+C Model: Rouleau & Martin (1991) logεS=-13 (see Nanni et al. (2016))
Jaeger400_12_jan17: M+C Model: Jaeger et al. (1998) 400K, logεS=-12 (see Nanni et al. (2016))
Rouleau12_mar17: M+C Model: Rouleau & Martin (1991) logεS=-12 (see Nanni et al. (2016))

gra: Graphites as in Bressan et al. (1998)

1: Sequence of isochrones at constant Z
2: Sequence of isochrones at constant t (variable Z)
